settings.heading: CREATE YOUR JEWELLERY BOX! 5 ITEMS FOR £80
settings.text: CHOOSE FROM ANY 5 ITEMS IN OUR STORE. EVERY PURCHASE COMES WITH COMPLIMENTARY FREE SHIPPING AND A PREMIUM QUALITY JEWELLERY BOX.

settings.heading: WHAT'S THE DEAL?
settings.text:
GET READY TO SAVE BIG! WITH OUR EXCLUSIVE OFFER, YOU'RE GUARANTEED TO SAVE AT LEAST £65+ OFF OUR INDIVIDUAL JEWELLERY PRICES TAGS. OUR JEWELLERY BOX FEATURE, LETS YOU HANDPICK ANY FIVE OR SEVEN PIECES FROM OUR ENTIRE WEBSITE. PLUS, YOUR CHOSEN PIECES WILL BE DELIVERED IN A FREE PERSONALISED OUTRAGE LONDON JEWELLERY BOX WHICH IS PERFECT FOR TRAVELLING.

WHETHER YOU'RE LOOKING FOR A SPECTACULAR GIFT OR WANT TO ENHANCE YOUR YEAR-ROUND JEWELLERY COLLECTION, THE CHOICE IS YOURS. WHAT WILL YOU SELECT? JOIN US NOW AND ENJOY THE BEST OF LUXURY JEWELLERY AT UNBEATABLE PRICES!

settings.heading: HOW IT WORKS?
settings.text:
1) Access the 'Create Your Jewellery Box' page.

2) Choose your desired jewellery by clicking on 'Choose My Jewellery.'

3)Select your pieces by clicking 'Add To Box.'

4) Once your box is complete, click 'Add To Cart' and proceed to checkout as usual.

5) Enjoy your curated box and your savings - we're confident you'll love it!
